item.title: Photo Roll 07 - Meet Imogen!
item.description: Falling down a rabbit hole. Most of these suggestions came from my good buddy Miranda Thomas, who thankfully and helpfully suggested KEH as a reputable used reseller. Which is good, because I sure don't have new-camera money. Mama (me) and the baby! Imogen is named after Imogen Cunningham, if anyone was wondering. A glamour shot, taken with my old Oneplus 7 Pro that I've used for the past few years.
